refnamediv.refpurpose: rewrite data expressions in an LPE

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &lperewr; tool rewrites data expressions occurring in a linear process equation (LPE). It reads the LPE from &infile; and writes the result to &outfile;. If &outfile; is not present, &cstdout; is used. If &infile; is not present, &cstdin; is used.

The following data expressions are rewritten:
conditions, action parameters, time expressions and next states of LPE summands
process parameters of the initial state
conditions and right-hand sides of data equations

Rewriting LPE summands and the initial state is done to simplify these parts of the LPE. Rewriting data equations is done to speed up state space generation. In most cases, this results in a performance gain of at most 5%.
